title: Gun Control Means Using Two Hand, The Warren Markowitz Show, Politically Incorrect, 11/7/2017
description: The Warren Markowitz Show, It's My World You Just Live In It. A soap box for Independent Ideas, current events and politics of the day. Anothe senseless shooting, well can anyone tell me what a sensed shooting is. The church masacre in Texas, the Las Vegas Concert Shootng and all within a month of each other. Gun Control advocates say we need more gun control, constitutionalists say no, who is correct, or is either correct? Podcast: Galtspeaks.com Contact: Radio@galtspeaks.com Follow us on twitter.com/radiomarkowitz & Facebook.com/radiomarkowitz Spreaker-www.spreaker.com/show/the-warren-markowitz-show
